Purpose: To detect and quantify Cryptococcal antigen in CSF or serum for the diagnosis and management of cryptococcal infection.
Container: CSF: sterile leak-proof container; Serum: sterile red-top tube or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Cryptococcal Antigen latex agglutination or enzyme immunoassay kit, pipettes with tips, test tubes or microwell plates, timer, vortex mixer, incubator or heat block
